permissions: Allowed for admins or users with update permission on the target user.
side_effects: Updates the user language; if is-default is set to true, other user languages for the same user are updated to is_default=false by a database trigger.
validation_notes: Argument <id> is required. At least one attribute must be provided (currently --is-default). --is-default expects true/false and is interpreted as true only when set to "true" (any other non-empty value is treated as false).

flags.name: --is-default
flags.validation: true/false; interpreted as true only when set to "true"
